onBoardingTitle1: Start your journey to safer driving!
onBoardingTitle2: Drive safely with our expert tips!
onBoardingSubtitle1: Let's ensure your safety and the safety of others on the road.
onBoardingSubtitle2: Learn essential driving tips and rules to navigate the roads safely and confidently.
onBoardingSubtitle3: Dive into our interactive lessons to enhance your understanding of road laws and best practices.
areYouReadyForYourDrivingLicence: Are you ready to get your driving licence?
supportQouteSuccess1: Fantastic work! Your consistent effort and determination are clearly paying off. Keep pushing forward; the results are truly impressive!
supportQouteSuccess2: Outstanding performance! Your dedication to improving each day is evident, and it's taking you closer to your goals. Stay focused and keep up the excellent work!
supportQouteFail1: Mistakes are proof that you are trying. Reflect on what went wrong and use it as a learning experience to improve.
supportQouteFail2: Great achievements are often born out of great setbacks. Use this experience to fuel your determination and keep going!
question: Question
andNeverForgetWeBelieveInYou: And never forget we believe in you
timeUp: This attempt has just ended. Don't forget, with the attempt you will be better. I trust you
